string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient
With the Memory Powder, Alcaster was able to attach the four map pieces and turn it into a map. According to the map, the Book of Ancient lies somewhere #baround Orbis Tower at some statue#k.

Phew, the spell worked. Now that the map is in one piece, we need to look through this. Let's see ... it's written in ancient language, so I'm having a hard time understanding this...Hmmm...I see...that's it! I got it! #t4031056# is hidden at the Orbis Tower! It's hidden in one of the statues there. I'm surprised it's there...

To open this statue, it looks like we need #b#t4031053##k from the battle...the ring works as the key here. Please head over to Orbis Tower, and come back with #b#t4031056##k in your hand! Meanwhile I'll be here figuring out how to seal #t4031056# up for good.
At the bottom of the statue lie a sparkling core. Use #b#t4031053##k to unlock it and investigate what's inside.

You haven't gotten #b#t4031056##k, yet. According to the map, #b#t4031056##k is hidden at a statue at the Orbis Tower, and to open it, you'll need #b#t4031053##k. Well, then, please head over to Orbis Tower now.
An old statue was there, but nothing could be found.
